campaign.text: The Barcelona City Council supports the FSFE's campaign 'Public Money, Public Code' because we need alliances to make Free Software the default setting in the public sector. The digital public infrastructure that we use should be a public good, owned and controlled by the citizens.
campaign.author: Francesca Bria, Chief Technology and Digital Innovation Officer for the City of Barcelona
